metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0812 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The interceptKeyBeforeDispatching function inpolicy/src/com/android/internal/policy/impl/PhoneWindowManager.java inSetup Wizard in Android 5.1.x before 5.1.1 LMY49G and 6.0 before 2016-02-01does not properly check for setup completion, which allows physicallyproximate attackers to bypass the Factory Reset Protection protectionmechanism and delete data via unspecified vectors, aka internal bug25229538.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
